Is it possible to create an ID without paying any fees to referrers or miners?

No, it's not possible to create an ID without paying any fees to referrers or miners. The protocol is designed to incentivize referrers and miners/stakers by distributing a portion of the fees to them. Referrers receive 20 VRSC up to three levels deep, and miners/stakers receive 100% of the remaining funds.

- 20 VRSC to the referrer’s ID
- 20 VRSC to the referrer’s referrer’s ID
- 20 VRSC to the referrer’s referrer’s referrer’s ID
- 20 VRSC to the miner of the block in which the ID is mined100% of all funds that are not paid to referrers go to miners or stakers of the blockchain.## To create an identity:
